subject: App Crash Report
body: Hello team, the app crashes whenever I try to generate a report. Steps: 1) Open Reports tab 2) Select Monthly view 3) Tap Export. Device: Pixel 6, Android 14.

subject: Feature Request: Custom Reminders
body: Hi, it would be great if we could set multiple custom reminders for a single task.
